message.content:
1. There was a reduction in the number of episodes of respiratory infections.
2. The duration of some symptoms was reduced.
3. Dyspnea was one of the symptoms whose duration was reduced.
4. Ear pain was one of the symptoms whose duration was reduced.

messages.content:
Statement: A reduction in the number of episodes of respiratory infections and duration of some symptomssuch as dyspnea and ear pain was observed.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
